test_scenarios.name: Verify Website Availability
steps: Open the Careerraah website (https://www.careerraah.com/) in a web browser.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The website loads successfully and displays the homepage without errors.

test_scenarios.name: Navigate to Course Listing Page
steps: Click on the 'Courses' link in the navigation bar.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The user is redirected to the course listing page, displaying a list of available courses.

test_scenarios.name: User Registration with Valid Credentials
steps: Click on the 'Register' or 'Sign Up' link.
Fill out the registration form with valid and required information (name, email, password).
test_scenarios.expected_result: The user is successfully registered and redirected to the user dashboard or a welcome page.

test_scenarios.name: User Login with Valid Credentials
steps: Click on the 'Login' or 'Sign In' link.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The user is successfully logged in and redirected to the user dashboard.

test_scenarios.name: View Course Details
steps: Navigate to the Course Listing page.
Click on a specific course from the list.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The user is redirected to the course details page, displaying information about the selected course (description, syllabus, instructor).

test_scenarios.name: Initiate Career Assessment
steps: Navigate to the Career Assessment page (e.g., through a link in the navigation or homepage).
test_scenarios.expected_result: The Career Assessment initialization process begins. User is directed to first assessment question or information screen.
